long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Does your friend or teacher not know how to control their fonts when sending emails? Does that weird website have wayyyyyyyyyyyyy too big of a font? Use this extension to change those big ahh fonts to your liking!
